doc.field: Labor relations, education papers, pamphlets, clippings, notes, publications. National Committee for Rural Schools minutes, correspondence, luncheon programs, other materials. Baltimore desegregation pamphlet. League for Industrial Democracy, NAACP, and other educational reform materials. Waterfront Commission of New York Harbor regulations, papers. Student recommendations, term papers on engineering unions. National War Labor Board materials.
